pages.text: The $(#8b0000)Blood Rune Stone$() is a rare rune that combines life and death energies. It requires mastery of both Life and Death rune stones to create.

pages.title: Alchemy Table Recipe
pages.text: $(l)Blood Rune Stone Recipe:$()$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients:$()$(br)• Base Rune Stone$(br)• Death Rune Stone$(br)• Life Rune Stone$(br)• Nether Wart$(br)• Fermented Spider Eye$(br)• Ghast Tear$(br)• Full Resonant Catalyst$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 30 XP, 1000 ticks$()

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: The Blood Rune Stone channels life and death duality. Useful for:$(br2)• Advanced ritual configurations$(br)• Powerful magical effects$(br)• Life-draining enchantments$(br)• Regeneration rituals$(br2)$(#888)Requires mastery of both Life and Death rune stones.$()
